pages.title: Sacred Honey
pages.text: The Bee Knights patrol the Golden Seelie Fields, looking for anyone who tries to steal their sacred honey.

pages.title: Bee Keep
pages.text: The best honey of the Golden Seelie Fields is kept at a Bee Keep. The Bee Keep is protected by several Bee Knights. The Sacred Honey Comb is kept in a glass display. The display can be broken by left clicking it rapidly so it will break, and the golden treasure is yours.
